content.raw: The titles like `srcsimulations-011` don't mean much to the users. When they start a constellation, on the kiosk, each constellation is given a unique name in the format `<team_name>-XXX`, displayed on the tab. Do you think we could use that same name here, so they can cross-check which results came from which constellation?
